      Returns a IndexedNodeSet containing all neighbors of the node at the specified index that are also contained in this set.

      Returns a IndexedNodeSet containing all neighbors of the node specified node that are also contained in this set.

      Constructs an set with the given node collection as basic collection, containing all nodes from the basis collection.
      IndexedNodeSet IndexedNodeSet.setOfContainedNodesWithOwnIndices()
      Constructs a new IndexedNodeSet with the nodes contained in this set as basis collection of the new set.
